topic.title: Now Available: Twenty-three Newly Digitized Foreign Relations Volumes
topic.body: This release is part of the Officeâ€™s ongoing project, in partnership with the University of Wisconsin Digital Collections Center, to digitize the entire Foreign Relations series. These volumes cover events that took place between 1940 and 1951 and were originally published in print between 1955 and 1982.
topic.image-description: Word cloud generated from 23 newly digitized Foreign Relations volumes
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
